Node.Text: So you think you can be a clown, a joker, a goof meister?!

Node.OptionToEnter: Yeah, everyone's always laughing at me!
Node.Text: You don't need to shout it, I can see that just looking at you! Well lets do a quiz and work it out, get 5 right and I'll tell you my world famous joke!
What was the name of the first panto clown to wear white face make-up instead of a mask?
That's right! What was the name of the first circus clown?
YES! Now onto a harder one: Infamous serial killer John Wayne Gacy was a clown, what was his clown called?
Correctamundo, if you're a real clown you'll know this one: The worlds oldest clown society clown international. When was it founded?
Good job! Are you sure you're not cheating?! Last one then, what is the fear of clowns called?
WOW You did it, I guess you can get the joke then!
Node.GiveReward: Why did the clown go to the doctor? Because he was feeling a little funny!
